Game.tutorial_00_portrait:
Collect clusters of 3 or more identical,
 adjacent planets on the grid. New 
planets fall in from above. Collect 
{@embed_spaceship@} and {@embed_meteorite@} to trigger a bonus game.0
Game.tutorial_02_portrait:
Collect 4 {@embed_meteorite@} to trigger the Whirl Bonus. 
 Planets may change position on the grid, 
 where they may be randomly collected
 or  form new clusters.0
Game.tutorial_00_landscape:
Collect clusters of 3 or more identical, adjacent planets on the grid. 
New planets fall in from above. Collect {@embed_spaceship@} and {@embed_meteorite@} to 
trigger a bonus game.0
Game.tutorial_01_landscape:
Collect 4 {@embed_spaceship@} to trigger the Warp Bonus. Collect additional 
planets or {@embed_star@} to win a prize instantly.0
Game.tutorial_02_landscape:
Collect 4 {@embed_meteorite@} to trigger the Whirl Bonus. Planets may change 
position on the grid, where they may be randomly collected 
or form new clusters.0
